com.sheepguru.api

Class RobotDirectives

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sheepguru.api.RobotDirectives

  • public class RobotDirectives
extends Object
    Handles per-domain individual properties for robots.txt entries
    Author:
    John Quinn

        public static final long LEASE_TIME
